valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Fri 16 Jan 2026 to 06:00 (UTC) on Sat 17 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Low just west of Shannon 986 expected Fastnet 1001 by midnight tonight. Low Humber 994 losing its identity

Wind
Cyclonic, 4 to 6, but 2 or 3 at first in west, becoming westerly or southwesterly, then backing southeasterly later, 3 to 5.
Sea state
Moderate, occasionally rough until later.
Weather
Rain then showers.
Visibility
Good, occasionally poor.
